title: Any one know this script font?
content:
I saw this font used a few different places one that I remember in particular was ultimate bet which paired this typeface and Avant Garde which actually looked pretty nice.  
I am pretty sure some one is going to know this right away thank you in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202183234im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_4958.png)
author: jfldesign
